name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Michael BUNDY, Appellant

casebody.head_matter:
445 A.2d 498
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Michael BUNDY, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted April 13, 1982.
Decided May 25, 1982.
Thomas L. McGill, Jr., Philadelphia (Court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Asst. Dist. Atty., Ronald Eisenberg, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
